text: aur raaja ne kahaah use mere paas lao aur jab yoosuf ke paas bheja hua aaya, to aapane usase kaha ki apane svaamee ke paas vaapas jao[1] aur usase poochho ki un striyon kee kya dasha hai, jinhonne apane haath kaat lie the? vaastav mein, mera paalanahaar un striyon ke chhal se bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai
